summary: BuildRequest specifies no requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff adds a public payment flow and multiple payment-related UI components, along with routing and hook behavior changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a public payment page/flow accessible via a new route (/pay/$id)
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, yet a new public payment route and page were implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented payment method selection UI (card vs PayPal)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (BuildRequest contains no requirements), but new UI for selecting payment methods was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented a credit/debit card payment form with client-side validation and simulated processing
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; new credit card form component simulates payment processing and validates fields.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented a PayPal payment UI/button with simulated processing
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; added PayPal flow simulation and UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a simple CAPTCHA component for human verification
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; introduces captcha verification component used in the public payment flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Added toast notification infrastructure/usage via sonner Toaster and toast calls
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; app-level Toaster added and components emit toast success/error messages.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced payment details card to generate/share a payment link with copy/open actions
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; added paymentLink construction and clipboard/window.open interactions.
Not requested; modifies React Query settings for listing payments.
